title: What caused the audio breakdown during the 2020 Democratic Presidential Debate on NBC, and why did Donald Trump call it a fake news organization? - Quora

response.answer_text: Trump loves the sound of his own voice. He hasn’t even bothered to form a government…most of the department heads are ‘acting’ and most of them have no idea what their job actually is. If he says it it’s just about always BS.
Regarding fake news 2 years of Collusion,collusion,collusion and obstruction of justice when there was none. CNN lost 1/3 of their viewers over that fake news.
